```{r}
library("psych")
library("knitr")
names(cps)
head(cps)
```

```{r}
cps$EXPER30<- cps$exper-30   
plot(cps$wage ~ EXPER30, xlab="Exprience30", ylab="Wage rate", 
      main="Figure 1. Scatter diagram for WAGE and EXPER30 ", col="hotpink" )
```

```{r}
cps$EXPER30sq<- cps$EXPER30^2  
model.1<- lm(cps$wage ~ cps$EXPER30sq) #estimate the model
summary(model.1)$coef  #show some of the results
summary(model.1)
```
```{r}
b1= as.numeric(coef(model.1)[1])
b2= as.numeric(coef(model.1)[2])
plot(cps$EXPER30,cps$wage,xlab="Exper30", ylab="Wage rate", 
        col="hotpink", main="Scatter and Fitted"  )
curve(b1+ b2*x^2, from=min(cps$EXPER30), to= max(cps$EXPER30), add=TRUE, col="lightblue", lwd=2)

```
